mapper.select: SELECT WholesalerID, Password, Cellphone, Email, Status, (CASE Status WHEN 'A' THEN '激活' WHEN 'F' THEN '冻结' END) AS StatusText, InUser, InDate, LastEditUser, LastEditDate FROM Wholesaler WHERE WholesalerID = #{wholesalerID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Wholesaler ( Cellphone, Email, Password, InUser, LastEditUser ) VALUES ( #{cellphone, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastEditUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
